person.persName: Joshua Barnes (Bath Co. State Rep. & doctor)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, physician, and politician. Kentucky native. Married to Lucretia Barnes. Father of Joseph Barnes, Isabella Barnes, Adelaide E. Barnes, W. Robert Barnes, Lucretia Barnes, Joshua Barnes, and Mary Barnes. Married to Adelaide Hord Barnes. Physician in Bath County in 1850. Owned seventeen enslaved people in 1850. Physician in Bath County in 1860. Owned twenty-six enslaved people in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1862 to 1865. Briefly abducted by the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) in Bath County in March 1863.
